OCTIWARE

Ready to lose yourself in something you’ll regret loving?
We make games that aren’t just played. They’re felt. And sometimes, they stick.

Join our Discord!

Our Vision

At Octiware, we don’t just make games. We build worlds that notice you.

Worlds that shift when you speak. Stories that wait for your touch. Characters that don’t forget what you did, or what you didn’t.

It starts with technical craft and visual precision. But that’s just the scaffolding. What matters is what happens when a quiet scene hits too hard, or when a tiny choice spirals into something you never saw coming.

We design for meaning, not just mechanics. For those moments when a game doesn’t just work, it feels. This is interactive fiction with a memory and a pulse.

Welcome to Octiware. Where passion meets pixels, and pixels push back.

Not Robots

Say Hi

We write code
and sometimes poetry

Octiware is a band of pixel romantics with questionable snack habits and dangerous levels of commitment.
We argue about commas. We ship feelings disguised as features.
Here’s the cast behind the chaos.

Jobs? Kinda.

3 YES, I'M IN

No suits
just sparks

We're not building a company cult. Just great games with people who give a damn.
You bring the skill, we’ll supply the caffeine, weird lore docs, and existential feature debates.
Let’s make something too bold to ignore.

Inside Octiware

Get a front-row seat to our creative process.
From early ideas to late-night breakthroughs, we share the journey behind every update and feature.
This is how we build transparently and together
